attributes.description:
: Established in 2003 gives us the ability to offer bank approved finance on a wide variety of available vehicles to suit your budget and preference.
: A 2 year extended warranty is available on finance and cash transactions.
: All vehicles are inspected and serviced by our RMI approved workshop prior to display on the showroom floor.
: Nationwide delivery can be arranged
: Excludes “delivery fee”, license and registration
Terms and conditions apply.

attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. She is exceptionally clean and mechanically sound. Extremely light on fuel and reliable. Features include; Blue tooth, Multimedia Interface, leather interior,Climate Control,Heated seats, Rear PDC,LED Daytime running lights and much more. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O 
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office  : 010 449 3410 
David   : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)

attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
